languages.text: Капитан-чартист Аустериус Торфаст основал Торговый дом "Торфаст и компаньоны", преуспевая в торговле и обзаведясь приличной эскадрой охранения. Спустя три десятилетия он направился в Зев, чтобы вернуться в Империум и испросить милости обретения Патента Вольного Торговца. Чем закончилось это предприятие — неизвестно.

Chartist Captain Austerius Thorfast founded the Thorfast and Companions Merchant Company, excelling in trade and acquiring a substantial escort fleet. After three decades, he travelled to the Maw to return to the Imperium in hopes of obtaining the fabled Warrant of Trade. It is not known how this venture ended.
languages.original_text: Капитан-чартист Аустериус Торфаст основал Торговый дом "Торфаст и компаньоны", преуспевая в торговле и обзаведясь приличной эскадрой охранения. Спустя три десятилетия он направился в Зев, чтобы вернуться в Империум и испросить милости обретения Патента Вольного Торговца. Чем закончилось это предприятие — неизвестно.

traits.locale_text: Chartist Captain Austerius Thorfast founded the Thorfast and Companions Merchant Company, excelled in trade and acquired a fair-sized escort fleet. After three decades, he travelled to the Maw to return to the Imperium and seek the fabled Warrant of Trade. It is not know how this venture ended.

Chartist Captain Austerius Thorfast founded the Thorfast and Companions Merchant Company, excelled in trade and acquired a fair-sized escort fleet. After three decades, he travelled to the Maw to return to the Imperium and seek the fabled Warrant of Trade. It is not know how this venture ended.

Chartist Captain Austerius Thorfast founded the Thorfast and Companions Merchant Company, excelling in trade and acquiring a substantial escort fleet. After three decades, he travelled to the Maw to return to the Imperium in hopes of obtaining the fabled Warrant of Trade. It is not known how this venture ended.

Chartist Captain Austerius Thorfast founded the Thorfast and Companions Merchant Company, excelling in trade and acquiring a substantial escort fleet. After three decades, he travelled to the Maw to return to the Imperium in hopes of obtaining the fabled Warrant of Trade. It is not known how this venture ended.

Chartist Captain Austerius Thorfast founded the Thorfast and Companions Merchant Company, excelling in trade and acquiring a substantial escort fleet. After three decades, he travelled to the Maw to return to the Imperium in hopes of obtaining the fabled Warrant of Trade. It is not known how this venture ended.

languages.text: 宪章船长奥特里乌斯·索法特舰长创立了索法特贸易公司，在贸易方面表现出色，还获得了一支庞大的护航舰队。三十年后，他的舰队穿过了巨口，回到了帝国，希望获授传说中的贸易授状。不过，这场征途的结局尚未知晓。
languages.original_text: Chartist Captain Austerius Thorfast founded the Thorfast and Companions Merchant Company, excelling in trade and acquiring a substantial escort fleet. After three decades, he travelled to the Maw to return to the Imperium in hopes of obtaining the fabled Warrant of Trade. It is not known how this venture ended.

traits.locale_text: 宪章船长奥特里乌斯·索法特舰长创立了索法特贸易公司，在贸易方面表现出色，还获得了一支庞大的护航舰队。三十年后，他的舰队穿过了巨口，回到了帝国，希望获授传说中的贸易许可证。不过，这场征途的结局尚未知晓。

languages.text: チャーティスト中隊長オーステリアス・ソーファストはソーファスト・アンド・コンパニオンズ商会を立ち上げた。そして交易で素晴らしい成果を上げ、大掛かりな護衛船団を獲得した。30年後、彼は伝説的な通商許可証を得ようと帝国へ戻るべくマウへ向けて出発した。その旅の顛末を知る者はいない。
languages.original_text: Chartist Captain Austerius Thorfast founded the Thorfast and Companions Merchant Company, excelling in trade and acquiring a substantial escort fleet. After three decades, he travelled to the Maw to return to the Imperium in hopes of obtaining the fabled Warrant of Trade. It is not known how this venture ended.

traits.locale_text: チャーティスト中隊長オーステリアス・ソーファストはソーファスト・アンド・コンパニオンズ商会を立ち上げた。そして交易で素晴らしい成果を上げ、大掛かりな護衛船団を獲得した。30年後、彼は伝説的な通商許可証を得ようと帝国へ戻るべくマウへ向けて出発した。その旅の顛末を知る者はいない。

languages.text: Le capitaine cartographe Austerius Thorfast fonda la Compagnie marchande Thorfast et ses Compagnons, qui excellait dans le commerce et acquit une flotte d'escorte considérable. Au bout de trois décennies, il voyagea vers la Gueule pour regagner l'Imperium, avec l'espoir d'obtenir la fameuse lettre de marque, mais nul ne sait comment s'acheva son entreprise.
languages.original_text: Chartist Captain Austerius Thorfast founded the Thorfast and Companions Merchant Company, excelling in trade and acquiring a substantial escort fleet. After three decades, he travelled to the Maw to return to the Imperium in hopes of obtaining the fabled Warrant of Trade. It is not known how this venture ended.

traits.locale_text: Le capitaine cartographe Austerius Thorfast fonda la Compagnie marchande Thorfast et ses Compagnons, qui excellait dans le commerce et acquit une flotte d'escorte considérable. Au bout de trois décennies, il voyagea vers la Gueule pour regagner l'Imperium, avec l'espoir d'obtenir la fameuse lettre de marque, mais nul ne sait comment s'acheva son entreprise.

languages.text: El capitán cartista Austerius Thorfast fundó la compañía mercenaria Thorfast y Amigos, especializada en el comercio y con una flota escolta significativa. Después de tres décadas, viajó a las Fauces para volver al Imperium con la esperanza de obtener la legendaria Patente de Comercio. Se desconoce el desenlace de esta empresa.
languages.original_text: Chartist Captain Austerius Thorfast founded the Thorfast and Companions Merchant Company, excelling in trade and acquiring a substantial escort fleet. After three decades, he travelled to the Maw to return to the Imperium in hopes of obtaining the fabled Warrant of Trade. It is not known how this venture ended.

traits.locale_text: El capitán cartista Austerius Thorfast fundó la compañía mercenaria Thorfast y Amigos, especializada en el comercio y con una flota escolta significativa. Después de tres décadas, viajó a las Fauces para volver al Imperium con la esperanza de obtener la legendaria Patente de Comercio. Se desconoce el desenlace de esta empresa.

languages.text: Chartisten-Captain Austerius Thorfast gründete das Handelsunternehmen "Thorfast und Gefährten", das Handel trieb und eine große Eskortflotte unterhielt. Nach drei Jahrzehnten reiste er zum Schlund und wollte zum Imperium zurückkehren, in der Hoffnung, den sagenumwobenen Handelsbrief zu erhalten. Wie dieses Unterfangen endete, ist nicht überliefert.
languages.original_text: Chartist Captain Austerius Thorfast founded the Thorfast and Companions Merchant Company, excelling in trade and acquiring a substantial escort fleet. After three decades, he travelled to the Maw to return to the Imperium in hopes of obtaining the fabled Warrant of Trade. It is not known how this venture ended.

traits.locale_text: Chartisten-Captain Austerius Thorfast gründete das Handelsunternehmen "Thorfast und Gefährten", das Handel trieb und eine große Eskortflotte unterhielt. Nach drei Jahrzehnten reiste er zum Schlund und wollte zum Imperium zurückkehren, in der Hoffnung, den sagenumwobenen Handelsbrief zu erhalten. Wie dieses Unterfangen endete, ist nicht überliefert.

languages.text: Haritacı Kaptan Austerius Thorfast; Thorfast ve Yoldaşları Tüccarlık Şirketi'ni kurdu, ticarette uzmanlaştı ve hatırı sayılır bir refakatçi filosu satın aldı. Otuz yılın ardından İmparatorluk'a dönüp o efsanevi Ticari Ruhsatname'ye kavuşabilmek umuduyla Ağız'a gitti. Yolculuğunun nasıl sonuçlandığı bilinmiyor.
languages.original_text: Chartist Captain Austerius Thorfast founded the Thorfast and Companions Merchant Company, excelling in trade and acquiring a substantial escort fleet. After three decades, he travelled to the Maw to return to the Imperium in hopes of obtaining the fabled Warrant of Trade. It is not known how this venture ended.

traits.locale_text: İmtiyazlı Kaptan Austerius Thorfast, Thorfast ve Yoldaşları Tüccar Şirketi'ni kurdu, ticarette uzmanlaştı ve hatırı sayılır bir eskort filosu satın aldı. Otuz yılın ardından İmparatorluk'a dönüp, o efsanevi Ticari Ruhsatname'yi elde edebilmek umuduyla Ağız'a gitti. Yolculuğunun nasıl sonuçlandığı bilinmiyor.
